trans-unit.source: Acquiring locks on threads with a SynchronizationContext applied is not allowed.
trans-unit.target: Acquiring locks on threads with a SynchronizationContext applied is not allowed.

trans-unit.source: A non-upgradeable read lock is held by the caller and cannot be upgraded.
trans-unit.target: A non-upgradeable read lock is held by the caller and cannot be upgraded.

trans-unit.source: Dangerous request for read lock from fork of write lock.
trans-unit.target: Dangerous request for read lock from fork of write lock.

trans-unit.source: Already transitioned to the Completed state.
trans-unit.target: Already transitioned to the Completed state.

trans-unit.source: This operation can only be executed against a valid lock.
trans-unit.target: This operation can only be executed against a valid lock.

trans-unit.source: JoinableTask does not belong to the context this collection was instantiated with.
trans-unit.target: JoinableTask does not belong to the context this collection was instantiated with.

trans-unit.source: Lazily created value faulted during construction.
trans-unit.target: Lazily created value faulted during construction.

trans-unit.source: Lazily created value not yet constructed.
trans-unit.target: Lazily created value not yet constructed.

trans-unit.source: This lock has already been marked for completion. No new top-level locks can be serviced.
trans-unit.target: This lock has already been marked for completion. No new top-level locks can be serviced.

trans-unit.source: This operation is not allowed while holding an active upgradeable read or write lock from an AsyncReaderWriterLock.
trans-unit.target: This operation is not allowed while holding an active upgradeable read or write lock from an AsyncReaderWriterLock.

trans-unit.source: This operation cannot be completed on an STA thread.
trans-unit.target: This operation cannot be completed on an STA thread.

trans-unit.source: An attempt to switch to the main thread failed to reach the expected thread. Was the JoinableTaskContext initialized on the wrong thread or with a SynchronizationContext whose Post method does not execute its delegate on the main thread?
trans-unit.target: An attempt to switch to the main thread failed to reach the expected thread. Was the JoinableTaskContext initialized on the wrong thread or with a SynchronizationContext whose Post method does not execute its delegate on the main thread?
trans-unit.note: An error displayed when there is a serious programming fault with an application. It will usually be thrown early in development in the application and is not expected to be seen by an end user.

trans-unit.source: The value factory has called for the value on the same instance.
trans-unit.target: The value factory has called for the value on the same instance.
